text: Vincent Council (born October 15, 1990) is an American professional basketball player who last played for Levickí Patrioti. He is a 1.88 m (6 ft 2 in) tall Point guard. ==High school career== Council played high school basketball at The Patterson School, in Lenoir, North Carolina. ==College career== Council played college basketball with the Providence Friars, from 2009 to 2013. ==Professional career== Council began his pro career in with Hapoel Tel AvivHapoel Tel Aviv signs rookie Vincent Council. in 2013. In June 2014, he signed with Rethymno of the Greek Basket League.Rethymno agreed to terms with Vincent Council. On September 22, 2015, Council joined Koroivos Amaliadas.Koroivos Amaliadas lands Vincent Council. On June 9, 2017, Council joined BC Nokia of the Korisliiga.Vincent Council decides on BC Nokia. ==References== ==External links== *RealGM.com Profile *Twitter Profile *Eurobasket.com Profile *Draftexpress.com Profile *Greek Basket League Profile *ESPN.com Profile *Providence College Friars Profile Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:American expatriate basketball people in Finland Category:American expatriate basketball people in Greece Category:American expatriate basketball people in Israel Category:Basketball players from New York (state) Category:BC Nokia players Category:Hapoel Tel Aviv B.C. players Category:Koroivos B.C. players Category:Providence Friars men's basketball players Category:Point guards Category:Rethymno B.C. players Category:Sportspeople from Brooklyn Category:American men's basketball players
title: Vincent Council
